pageSetting.title: 职能部室考核评语查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct fapz.khnf, case when fapz.khzq=1 then '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when fapz.khzq=1 then cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '第'||cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8) )|| '季度' else cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, fapz.famc,zxpffa.py from znbs_zxpffa zxpffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on zxpffa.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join khdx_jg khjg on zxpffa.khdxdh =khjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy2 on zxpffa.pjr = hy2.khdxdh where 1=1 and fapz.khnf=$khnd$ and fapz.khzq=$khzq$ and zxpffa.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$fabh$ and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and zxpffa.khdx='1'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select distinct fapz.khnf, case when fapz.khzq=1 then '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when fapz.khzq=1 then cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '第'||cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8) )|| '季度' else cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, fapz.famc,zxpffa.py from znbs_zxpffa zxpffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on zxpffa.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join khdx_jg khjg on zxpffa.khdxdh =khjg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy2 on zxpffa.pjr = hy2.khdxdh where 1=1 and fapz.khnf=$khnd$ and fapz.khzq=$khzq$ and zxpffa.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$fabh$ and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and zxpffa.khdx='1' ) t
